description: The 1000th issue. It has been released free online at the Beano website.
Released September 2010.
name: The Beano Annual 2011

description:
Sleek!

By the time I was fourteen I knew how to dress and fix my hair and I was aware that my figure had never gone through the gawky stage! I was already getting notes from boys who observed that my hair was silky and sun-colored, and that my eyes were blue as sapphires! As I proceded toward twenty, the phrases of my suitors became more elaborate, but they were basically the same... I held a fatal attraction for men!

Afraid To Love!!

I had seen too much unhappiness in my short lifetime... my older sister's marriage had failed... my own father and mother quarreled violently and often... and I made up my mind while I was still in my teens that love would never wreck my life! If it was not for me... then why was my heart pounding when I was in Gary's arms?

Pursuit of Happiness

I'd come to the company dance with Mr. Lansing and his wife... they treated me just fine but there's only so much your friends can do for you! The rest is up to you... and I was painfully shy at these affairs!

Prince of Hearts (Text Only Story)

Confusion

In a few short months I was to become Mrs. Gary Price, and you couldn't find a happier girl anywhere! I was off to look at wedding gowns in nearby Wharton city, but the way Gary kissed me good-bye that day, you'd have thought I was going to the moon...

Her Dim Love

No Description

Lest We Forget: Theodore Roosevelt

When the rough riders charged up San Juan Hill, Theodore Roosevelt, a middle-aged writer-statesman, led the hardened plainsmen he had recruited for the Spanish-American War in 1898 there was a great fighting man... a hero...

You won't believe what the fickle hand of fate has in store for Peter Parker, Mary Jane and Aunt May! But even as Peter and his family adjust to their great new pad and cool new clique, the hordes of Hydra make a final push to take over the United States! Will the web-head and the New Avengers stop the revitalized Hydra from bringing America to its knees? And if so, at what cost? And in THE OTHER, Spidey faces his biggest threat yet - a foe so insidious he can't hope to handle it alone. With friends like Reed Richards, Stephen Strange and Hank Pym, he won't have to. But can even the world's greatest minds change the course of fate? And if they could, would they dare? Having finally accepted the truth, Peter Parker decides to put the red and blue tights in the closet and spend some quality time with Aunt May and MJ. But Morlun's got other plans - and this time, there's no Ezekiel to help the web-slinger. If he's going to have any hope to thwart Morlun's obscene mission, he's got two choices: Evolve or die?!

Collecting AMAZING SPIDER-MAN #519-528, FRIENDLY NEIGHBORHOOD SPIDER-MAN #1-4, MARVEL KNIGHTS SPIDER-MAN #19-22 and SPIDER-MAN: THE OTHER Sketchbook.
name: Volume Four

volume.name: The Amazing Spider-Man by JMS Ultimate Collection

description:
Overview

  • Distress - A knight returns from battle and gets hired to save a fair maiden from an evil wizard's castle.
  • Satan Weeps - A bored young man dabbles in the dark arts.
  • The Vengeance of the Canoes - Rich patrons of a cruise ship make a grave error in mocking poor natives.
  • House for Sale - A new real estate agent gets his first house to sell, but it's rumored to be haunted...
  • The Card of Death - Countess Von Bludd goes on the prowl for victims to quench her bloodlust.
name: Distress; Satan Weeps; The Vengeance of the Canoes; House for Sale; The Card of Death

description:
Overview

  • Fear-Feeder - A horrible creature goes on a rampage to sate its hunger for fear.
  • The Eyes of the Beholders - An aging ballerina makes a deal with Satan to regain her youth, but will she be willing to pay the price?
  • Castle of Fear! - An exorcist goes to battle the Devil in a house he has claimed.
  • Sanctuary? - An unscrupulous business man intends to make a safe haven for himself on an island, but not if the local voodoo lord has anything to say about it.
name: Fear-Feeder; The Eyes of the Beholders; Castle of Fear!; Sanctuary?

description:
Overview

  • Mirror, Mirror, On the Wall - A woman sells her soul to be beautiful, and uses her looks to get her way in life.
  • I Want to Be a Star! - A struggling actor finds a magic genie and makes a wish, but the genie takes it too literally.
  • Child's Play - Two children play with some boats. What could be so horrible about that? You'd be surprised...
  • The Snake God - A man tries to oppose the voodoo snake god.
  • What's Inside Roger? - A handsome but selfish actor meets his true self when he looks in a mirror.
name: Mirror, Mirror, On the Wall; I Want to Be a Star!; Child's Play; The Snake God; What's Inside Roger?

description:
Overview

  • A Matter of Life or Death - A man's insurance company thinks he is dead.
  • Trespassers - Two aliens pretend to be ghosts to scare away humans.
  • Halloween Scene - A woman finds herself trapped in a store on a Halloween night, and a monster is stalking her!
  • Moon Murderer - A traveling salesman is suspected of being an elusive serial killer who kills during full moons, just like tonight...
name: A Matter of Life or Death; Trespassers; Halloween Scene; Moon Murderer!

description:
Overview

  • Fabric of Death - A heartless sweatshop owner doesn't believe his workers when they say he'll pay for his misdeeds.
  • Storm Freak - Two men recover a lost treasure, but can they escape its curse?
  • The Burning - A Salem judge burns an innocent girl for being a witch, but a true witch swears she will make him pay.
  • Hades University - A young lady headed for Hadenville accidentally winds up in Hadesville, where the university is quite literally a hell of a place!
name: Fabric of Death; Storm Freak; The Burning; Hades University

description:
Overview

  • Soul Survivor - A wicked circus owner uses a spell to extend his life at the cost of another's life, but there are unforeseen effects.
  • Catfish - A scientist evolves a cat into a cat-man, but when he tries it on himself he doesn't get what he expected.
  • Shark Bait - Sailors plot to feed a former Nazi U-boat commander to the sharks.
  • Friends to the End - Partners in crime turn on one another and one of them gets locked in a dungeon to die, but his former friend may face a similar fate.
name: Soul Survivor; Catfish; Shark Bait; Friends to the End

description: Concluding his lengthy historic run on Spider-Man, JMS takes our hero to new highs and new lows-setting the stage for a new era of Spidey unlike any other! Collecting the famous Civil War, Back in Black and One More Day storylines, this volume has it all: Spider-Man in his new red armor, Spider-Man back in his black costume and Spider-Man unmasked to the public! Spidey fights on both sides of the Civil War, against Captain America and Iron Man themselves! And when Aunt May gets shot by one of the Kingpin's henchmen, how far will Peter go to save her? Witness the final days of Peter and Mary Jane's marriage! Collecting AMAZING SPIDER-MAN #529-545, FRIENDLY NEIGHBORHOOD SPIDER-MAN #24, SENSATIONAL SPIDER-MAN #41, SPIDER-MAN: ONE MORE DAY SKETCHBOOK, MARVEL SPOTLIGHT: SPIDER-MAN - ONE MORE DAY.
name: Volume Five

description:
For A Few Troubles More, set in Belfast Pubs, is a comedy of two prats: Dougie Patterson and Ivor Thompson. Dougie is a smartarse whose remarks constantly get him into trouble. Ivor is a drunken get who once shot himself in the foot. In the sometimes pathetic future that fate has in store for them, both discover they have a lot to learn about weddings, laxatives - and the consequences of tying naked people to police landrovers.

This hilarious graphic folly is from the creative team responsible for the acclaimed Troubled Souls. It's scripted by Garth Ennis (winner of the 1990 Speakeasy Award for Best New Writer) and the besotted saga is brought to life by the artistry of John McCrea and Wendy
Simpson. A major new work from comic's brightest rising stars.
[All text from back cover]
name: A Crisis Accident
